Reviews.Title: “over priced tatty rooms and surly service”
Reviews.Author: AliceCristal
Reviews.Content: wed mistake greeted barman rude told reservation told wait 5 minutes apology vinyl tatty staircase paid odds double cleanish otherwise grotty ages door close loo roll toilet overhead lighting dim couldnt read lamp soap glass plastic cups drink ive egypt â£10 night breakfast cafe below overpriced poor avoid

Reviews.Title: “Basic accommodations - good value”
Reviews.Author: dougamsterdam
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 3 times recommend travelers budget location 2 blocks dam square 3 blocks red light district 10 min walk central station spartan clean available private bath aware located serves hotel office pub hours knock door gain access staff friendly except broad attitude note elevator bell staff tote own luggage narrow staircase hotel krasnapolsky ive stayed stay week cost 1 night

Reviews.Title: “Cheap for a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Budsa
Reviews.Content: easter weekend friends cycled london amsterdam via ferry yesterday legs dont feel forgive amsterdam absolutely rammed easter weekend corner house handful budget hotels available booked 3 months advance available excluding booked desperation stay despite read negative reviews post review document favourable experience offer bit balance ritz accommodation satisfactory standard clean towels soap shower gel provided sizes vary bit fifth floor 12 14 12 encompasses 11 extra locked door onto wall removed tiny whereas 14 little half size friend floor didnt shared shower toilet floor fourth fifth floors clean light flickered shower fifth floor strong family resemblance staff warm greeting arrived bar serves checkin desk pay advance showered checkin arranged meet bar opportunity amstel staff smiles welcoming returned hotel little 9pm days cycling toll bar staff keys quickly contrary tales sleepless nights slept log streets centre amsterdam noisy night fifth floor probably helped dampen bit slept didnt try breakfast checkedout keen bit amsterdam headed road stay secure bike parking centraal station east west day overnight reasonably flash bikes incident

Reviews.Title: “Basic Accommodation - But GREAT location, perfect for short break”
Reviews.Author: Ash034
Reviews.Content: hotel pick location dam square middle shops bars restaurants perfect short weekend break dont tend spend alot time hotel anyway basic tv bathroom towels included note toiletries hairdryer tram line run outside hotel little noisey drinking evenings dont tend notice pub nice cosy vibe pub reasonably priced drinks wouldnt recommend restaurant overpriced basic food ie 8 euros basic tuna salad overall basic accommodation perfect location

Reviews.Title: “Its Cheap and Cheerful. A real bargain.”
Reviews.Author: Dannyton1971
Reviews.Content: travelled amsterdam 2011 meet friends england booked accomodation couldnt change bigger left task single wasnt pricey safe central looked cafe corner house found wary due postings comments hotel tripadvisor booked single shared toiletshower directly bar shown pleased clean safe view window bit noisy trams amsterdam times telly bbc1 sink wardrobe hangers left bar soap towel own towel manager called theo honest opinion couldnt met nicer person family originally turkish descent soon talking life maybe scottish found staff hotel friendly courteous helpful amsterdam usual pubs trips pals time watching climax english premiership ni globe sports bar watched scottish season day staff locals couldnt welcoming couple free drinks bob team chelsea won premiership 80 win beers game pool cafe beers wee sing song people watching bar de tended round nights visting cafe de friend look serve beer closing time hotel pals theo couldnt met nicer person tis time icelandic volcano blowing top causing disruption flights sunday started airports scotland closed due cloud mentioned theo bit concerned stay told worry ensure roof head couldnt home major relief hear didnt fancy sleep rough hadnt credit card bank card directly bar 2 didnt night cap busy wake hungover slumber 9am ensuring didnt waste trip lying bed feeling sorry luck glasgow airport monday travelled scotland exceptional weekend amsterdam return friends staying cafe corner house cheap cheerful nice nice queries jus mail

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay there at any cost you can get better for same money”
Reviews.Author: ahluwalia5
Reviews.Content: worst hotel amsterdam doubt prefer sleep dustbin time reservation private bathroom shared dirty ancient bathroom light shared toilet disgusting tried pay card couldnt machine didnt reception wasnt paid cash receipt crappy dark dingy dated pub ghetto worth score law amsterdam smoking staff clients smoking doing drugs bedding smelt smoke sound proofing staff untrained monkeys cant speak dutch nor english unhelpful straight banana boat receipt boy started arguing barman didnt hotel issues cleaning streets speaking humans understand swear words am reporting hotel tourist board damage reputation fine city sincerely recommend called hotel closed low quality acceptable europe

Reviews.Title: “Good base for Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: LPJR
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice rough round edges wife romantic weekend base tour city friends fine stayed amsterdam comfy beds clean bedding staff friendly served beer arrival able leave luggage secure booking date reason booked lost value money ticket corner house alway 20 cheaper nearby rivals

Reviews.Title: “morning desk clerk ... rudest pr_ck I've ever met.”
Reviews.Author: mikedada
Reviews.Content: stayed week hotel ok staff pleasant morning person rude arrogant close yelled bullied guests found son owner uncommon enjoy rung 930am intimidated yelled otherwise miss

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Great Location, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: madmonkey718
Reviews.Content: ive amsterdam dozen times stayed expensive hotels visit perfect stay hotel people noted ritz paying ritz stop complaining plus youre amsterdam outside basically slept sometimes drop items change clothes etc clean secure friendly personable staff price awesome perfect
